description: Expert in creating SEO-optimized, engaging, and original full-length articles. Please start with a keyword.
curatorsnotes: This is a really handy GPT for when you need to get not only content ideas but also a structured approach to creating that content. It will generate 5 headlines for you, and when you have chosen one, it will create an outline, an image and then the text for every item in your outline. In the end, you will have an extensive amount of content to work with, which - from a quality perspective, is definitely also a notch over what plain ChatGPT produces. The only unfortunate thing is that the images created contain text and graphics that don't make sense.
